pieces.name: Dream Bench Alpha
pieces.dreamExcerpt: I was floating above a field of wheat, and the golden stalks wove themselves into a seat that held me steady against the wind...

pieces.name: Floating Couch
pieces.dreamExcerpt: The purple clouds descended and formed a resting place, soft as memories, curved like the horizon at dusk...

pieces.name: Spiral Dreamform
pieces.dreamExcerpt: Colors spiraled upward like prayers made visible, each point a moment suspended between sleeping and waking...
